page.title: 13DARTMOUTH PRIMARY (cont.)
page.content: Our school goes on a lot of day and residential visits,as part of our projects.We are able to talk while we work,we have team-meetings in our practical area to discuss our area's activities.The top juniors have a team-teaching system,a different teacher takes us for language,art environmental studies and maths. On Wednesday afternoons we choose different clubs, small group may go on an outing or we do arts and crafts. We have a hall where we are able to do gym,P.E. dance and drama in the winter. Every child has their own tray in which they keep their own property.The younger children do painting and drawing.They also have an extra playtime in the afternoon. I wish that we could do more work in the afternoon and less games outside.
